thread.section_title: Jomashop Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Jomashop | www.jomashop.com | 5 of 259
thread.title: Jinwen Chai

author: Jinwen Chai
title: Jinwen Chai
text: My son picked a few style of the Fossil watches that he would like to have for his Christmas gift and we found the same brand, style at a great pricing from Jomashop. The review on the websites overall looks good and it also listed as a google certified site. So we just ordered. The watch arrives on time, no difference at all vs. if purchasing from a store. So we are very satisfied. Fossil is a known brand and Jomashop is a genuine seller, as long as you know the product you are buying, you can buy from Jomashop! It also provides warranty which gives a sense of ease but usually I try to pick products that has good quality itself first. I definitely will recommend Jomashop!
